name: The Backward Journey
description:
The Backward Journey is an experience about letting go. To progress between levels, you have to abandon your skills, reflecting the things holding you back (at least, it was in our plans to make so :P), aswell as increasing the game difficulty (in a game reaaaaaaaaaaally well balanced).  Enjoy!

Controls:

Move - A/D
Dash - Left Shift
Defend - F
Jump - Space (2x for Double Jump)
Melee Attack: i / Left Mouse
Ranged Attack: o / Right Mouse

Team:

Diego Gonçalves

Iago Barreto

Pierre Freire

Jhony Lucas
